name: Yellow Extasy
description:
Actually i was working on a base, but i love this Custard Mix pur to much! A strong vanilla taste, with a lemon zing. I can imagine, the people who like a stronger lemon can add some more FE Lemon and it works fine. 

This recipe was featured on thefogvlog Bangers - Custard episode. See the review here
https://youtu.be/mC_MG0wnkNM?t=1562

**Other recipe recommendation**

**If you like a special Dessert-Vape, you must try my "YM Cheesecake-Hazelnut-Custard":** https://alltheflavors.com/recipes/184204#ym_vanilla_hazelnut_cheesecake_custard_by_zugmaschine

**And if you like a good Ice Cream Vape, try my "Holy Vanilla Ice Cream"-recipe::** https://alltheflavors.com/recipes/62201#holy_vanilla_ice_cream_by_zugmaschine I hope, you enjoy!
author: Zugmaschine

reviews.text: I love this recipe. Creamy delish Vanilla, with the right "ZING" of Lemon.
